name: treejs-model-loader-wrapper
description: Simple wrapper for tree.js OBJ model loader
author: Adam Nowocin <adam.nowocin@gmail.com>

scripts.registerbitbucket: node ./node_modules/jspm/jspm.js config registries.bitbucket.baseurl ssh://git@bitbucket.org/ && node ./node_modules/jspm/jspm.js config registries.bitbucket.handler jspm-git && node ./node_modules/jspm/jspm.js config registries.bitbucket.timeouts.lookup 200
scripts.postinstall: npm run registerbitbucket && npm run jspminstall
